info.title: ThreatConnect API
info.description: This is Threatconnect's V3 API documentation

get.description: Returns a single Indicator corresponding to provided uniqueId

parameters.name: uniqueId
parameters.description: ID of the Indicator to be fetched

schema.description: param ID of the Indicator that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Indicator subentity fields to include in response (See OPTIONS endpoint for valid values)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Boolean that detnotes whether counts should be returned in the resultset

put.description: Allows the updating of an existing Indicator

parameters.name: uniqueId
parameters.description: ID of the Indicator to be updated

schema.description: param ID of the Indicator that needs to be updated

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Indicator subentity fields to include in response (See OPTIONS endpoint for valid values)

parameters.name: createActivityLog
parameters.description: Boolean to signal whether or not to create an alert for this action

requestBody.description: The Indicator object to be updated

delete.description: Allows the deletion of an existing Indicator

parameters.name: uniqueId
parameters.description: ID of entity to be deleted

schema.description: param ID of the Indicator that needs to be deleted

parameters.name: createActivityLog
parameters.description: Boolean to signal whether or not to create an alert for this action

get.description: Returns a list of all Indicators

parameters.name: tql
parameters.description: TQL query string for filtering response list

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Indicator subentity fields to include in response (See OPTIONS endpoint for valid values)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Boolean that detnotes whether counts should be returned in the resultset

post.description: Allows the creation of a new Indicator

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Indicator subentity fields to include in response (See OPTIONS endpoint for valid values)

parameters.name: createActivityLog
parameters.description: Boolean to signal whether or not to create an alert for this action

requestBody.description: New Indicator object to be created

options.description: Returns information about the entity fields

get.description: Returns a list of deleted Indicators

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A type value for limiting results to provided type

parameters.name: deletedSince
parameters.description: A date for limiting the query results. Will return indicators deleted after date provided

post.description: Enriches the selected indicator with 3rd-Party information
Enriches a list of Indicators with 3rd-Party information

options.description: Returns a list of valid field options
Returns a list of valid tql options
